# HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.unknown

**Case**

The WiFi satellite accessory status is unknown.

## Declaration

```swift
case unknown
```

## Network states

- **HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.connected**: The WiFi satellite accessory is connected.
- **HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.notConnected**: The WiFi satellite accessory isn’t connected.

items.description: The WiFi satellite accessory is connected.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueWiFiSatelliteStatus.connected

items.description: The WiFi satellite accessory isn’t connected.
